title: A Woman Of Action Finds Freedom In The Outback In 'Untold'
teaser: The Untold is a fictionalized account of Jessie Hickman's life, a real-life outlaw on the run in the Australian outback. NPR's Scott Simon speaks with Courtney Collins about her debut novel.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
